title: How To Make a Website with Bootstrap

metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: How TO - Make a Website with Bootstrap
Learn how to create a responsive website with the Bootstrap CSS Framework.
content.html: Learn how to create a responsive website with the Bootstrap CSS Framework.

content.text: Bootstrap is the most popular HTML, CSS, and JavaScript framework for developing responsive, mobile-first websites. Bootstrap is completely free to download and use.
content.html: Bootstrap is the most popular HTML, CSS, and JavaScript framework for developing responsive, mobile-first websites. Bootstrap is completely free to download and use.

links.text: we suggest that you read our Bootstrap Tutorial

content.text: Note: If you don't know Bootstrap, we suggest that you read our Bootstrap Tutorial .
content.html: Note: If you don't know Bootstrap, we suggest that you read our Bootstrap Tutorial.

content.text: Note: The newest version of Bootstrap is Bootstrap 5 .
content.html: Note: The newest version of Bootstrap is Bootstrap 5.

content.text: Tip: Ever heard about W3Schools Spaces ? Here you can create your Bootstrap website from scratch or use a template.
content.html: Tip: Ever heard about W3Schools Spaces? Here you can create your Bootstrap website from scratch or use a template.
